title: 服务器不刷怪求助~
author: Tanxiao
txt_content:
有大神知道的帮助我一下{:10_512:}
服务器配置文件如下~：
#Minecraft server properties
#Tue Jun 02 04:30:09 CST 2015
generator-settings=
allow-nether=true
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
server-port=31865
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
force-gamemode=false
level-seed=
server-ip=0.0.0.0
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=true
white-list=false
spawn-animals=true
snooper-enabled=false
hardcore=false
texture-pack=
online-mode=false
pvp=true
difficulty=2
enable-command-block=false
server-name=Unknown Server
gamemode=0
player-idle-timeout=0
max-players=160
spawn-monsters=true
generate-structures=true
view-distance=5
spawn-protection=0
motd=A Minecraft Server


服务器可以正常生成动物...但是不会生成怪物,不管是晚上还是山洞还是矿坑里全都不生成....但是可以用怪物蛋生成，刷怪笼也能生成，末地，地狱都不刷怪....这个是什么原因啊...

replies.author: Tanxiao
replies.txt_content:
Tanxiao 发表于 2015-6-2 12:50
试过了 提示红名英文，貌似没用~~

replies.author: Tanxiao
replies.txt_content:
LS_jie 发表于 2015-6-2 12:11
输入/gamerule doMobSpawnin true就行了

replies.author: 哥兜里有钱
replies.txt_content: 游戏里面输入/gamerule doMobspawning true 就行了，如果说你没权限请在后台输入/manuadd 你的名字 owner
